Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The breakfast was little costly so I did not option for it A little away from the beach and other attractions
Positive_Review: The rooms were clean and well maintained

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: Probably the most comfortable bed I ve slept in in Spain We had a junior suite with a balcony which was excellent Tea and coffee in the room and a very reasonably priced minibar Very pleasant and shady bar and terrace We were going to a concert in the jardin de Palau and it was only a 5 minute walk This hotel is not in the centre but is on the tourist bus route and near to metro stations

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Little far from Down town however it s near to FCB restaurant staff needs to be more friendly bed matters were exhausted
Positive_Review: Check in was fast smooth and welcoming we ve been chose this hotel due to near location of Campnue Suite was clean modern and well maintained Room service was good and fast Finally check out process was fast with great assistance to provide Airport taxi

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: This Hotel is located in a quiet and pleasant area only a few minutes walk to the nearest Metro Maria christina The staff at reception are very helpfull and friendly we really felt welcome The room was great very large and great bathroom shower If we will return to Barcelona we will stay here again

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The restaurant within the hotel was terrible my meal burger and fries was raw in the middle sent back then came up worse than the first time I could have got food poisoning or worse asked for the manager but he had gone home it was only 6 30pm Run by Muppets the cook is a health hazard
Positive_Review: Close to Nou camp Very clean large Appartment Very nice

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: wish there was a swimming pool
Positive_Review: The room is like a suite with separate are for making coffee with mini bar then lounge with sofa and desk chairs Also there is a partition to the bedroom with un suite full bathroom superb accommodation for the money paid

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The hotel is very far from the center During rainy days there is no taxi coming so we were blocked one evening at the hotel
Positive_Review: The room is new clean and very spacious

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: Fantastic service and the hotel is modern and comfortable Clean all around The outside patio is perfect for relaxing drinks and a bite to eat Stayed 6 nites Air conditioning works perfect

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: Great breakfast friendly stuff We had a very nice suite on the first floor i would recomend this hotel even though it is about 20 min walk from the camp nou and a bit far from the city center

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The hotel staff failed to arrange a mini van taxi to the airport thou I informed them one day before and I ended up renting two taxi s Some of The staff has poor information about the city
Positive_Review: The value for money is far near the Metro station Hop hop bus and Club Barcelona

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The hotel room feels a bit old the corridors carpets worn out the bath tiles cracked the TV reception was absolutely horrible impossible to watch anything as the picture was distorted and keeps freezing every few seconds Luckily I had my laptop so I could watch movies on it The breakfast was ok but no warm choices except an egg Not much around the property its mostly residential Booked and paid for a room with balcony but didnt get that Also it was supposed to have a cooking facilities but the room I got only had minibar which was also expensive
Positive_Review: The rooms are very spacious and the location is in good proximity to the football stadium It is also about 10 mins walk to the metro which will take you into the city centre The bed was quite big which was nice

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Positive_Review: Nice quiet relaxing hotel great location in Les Corts my favourite part of the city Beautiful well appointed room Great restaurant with a lovely outdoor space

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: The staff could have been a little more ethical while treating their clients and the AC of the room i was in didn t work the staff refused to change my room till i didn t pack my bags and come down to the concierge at 2am
Positive_Review: only the fact that it had a good location

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: TV channels should have more choices for English guests
Positive_Review: nice comfortable suites with large balcony fully covered providing full privacy it has also small kitchen but without any cooking pots the hotel is in a very quite neighbour close to a main street with banks some restaurants around but little far from the centre about 20 minutes by underground The nearest metro station is only 7 minutes walk

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Really minor issues they didn t have the appliances connected and they didn t have an SA 3 pin adaptor
Positive_Review: The breakfast was fantastic The variety was limited but the quality was truly excellent Staff polite and helpful

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: We were two people but toiletries were only for one person Also bottled water was not provided in the room
Positive_Review: The staff were really friendly the breakfast was amazing and the room was very spacious

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Why doesn t the bathroom have a real door with a lock I ve seen this in many hotels but never understood why Even married couples want some privacy
Positive_Review: Extremely service minded staff They helped us with the little things like picking up a water bottle from the closed kitchen and other things The hotel is not particularly close to Barcelona city centre but close enough to take a cab for 15 20 euro Also within in a 5 min walk you have the tram or metro that will take you to the centre in 15 20 min For us it was perfect because we needed to be in that area and its also very close to the airport but still in the city Calm and nice area close to L illa shopping centre

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: For the first 2 days we were in a standard room although booked paid for a suite The hotel had a water pipe problem and were ripping up the floor outside us hammering etc from morning til night for 2 days until they finally arranged to move us The pool was being cemented over although the website advertised it as a hotel with pool The website had also charged us the wrong amount online according to the hotel had pre paid by card so we had to pay even more on checkout
Positive_Review: Clean rooms and friendly staff

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites a Marriott Lifestyle Hotel
Negative_Review: Their was no swimming pool when we arrived we were not informed of this No English channels to watch
Positive_Review: Staff were helpful room was spacious and clean Nice area good location for what we needed Staff brought us a complimentary bottle of bubbly which was very lovely Nice bed bathrobes and slippers were lovely Breakfast was really nice area was nice to eat breakfast
